idea:
Green Energy Solar Solutions helps to provides homeowners with simple and affordable clean energy.
We believe that going solar should not be headache and should be hassle-free.
We at Green Energy Solar solutions provide facilities that helps you in installing machinery which runs on Green/Solar Energy.
We not only do the "Installation", but if required assist in its "maintenance" if required for reasonable to no upfront cost.
Using solar power  for electricity contributes towards reducing your electricity bill and moreover you contribute towards using clean energy.
name: GREEN ENERGY SOLAR SOLUTIONS

idea:
Its Vishal choudhary , I have a startup idea which is a social networking application named as " Cronicle" . 

I have the entire design , blueprint and business plan ready and the copyright and trademark has also been filed. I am just waiting for an investor who can collaborate .  

      Basically Cronicle is a social media platform which has feature where user can put their entire day story alongwith this they can save their pic , videos and documents too .Apart from this  "Cronicle" will have multiple other features like friends table , comparison page , invitation section , event organizing page and many more .  

Cronicle surely has ability to attract millions or might be billions of users through its unique features and pleasant design . Other than for users Cronicle has a different section for brands where worlds almost all companies can endorse their product as daily and  weekly basis . 

   Infact cronicle will be the first platform where no ads will come in between the features and users while users will themselves go to the brand section if they are interested for any product .  

      I can't explain better with words , whereas my presentation can show you the vision that how much big and interesting the "Cronicle" is .  

With just few capitals "Cronicle" can stand and compete with the big billion companies like facebook , instagram and twitter and surely can become itself a billion dollar company  .  

   Just help me with the finance and possibly a Big billion dollar company can get its shining future .


Thanks and Regards  

Vishal Choudhary
name: Cronicle

idea:
To Create state of art facility to process vegetables and fruits with limited human intervention.


We will be doing grading, scanning, washing, sorting, cutting, peeling mechanically and making ready to use / serve fruits and vegetables so that quality and hygiene of the food is maintained at a very high level.


Building adequate infrastructure of cold chain and processing


Creation of farmer - consumer market thereby helping the farmer to directly sell his produce to consumer, eliminating middlemen  thus improving farmer lives.
name: DASHAMI AGRO PRIVATE LIMITED
